rows.label: qst102203_msg0001
rows.name: Glad you could make it!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0002
rows.name:
Nis told me he asked you
to come. Sorry to trouble
you when you're busy.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0003
rows.name:
I need you to subjugate the
monsters around the campsite.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0004
rows.name:
Securing the area is
important, after all.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0005
rows.name:
Your targets are three Gamen
Tasmen and three Dusky Lator.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0006
rows.name:
If you deal with that many, they
probably won't come any closer.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0007
rows.name: I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0101
rows.name:
Your targets are three Gamen
Tasmen and three Dusky Lator.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0102
rows.name:
Show me the skills that Vandham
held in such high regard!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0201
rows.name: Whoa! You're done already?! Good work!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0202
rows.name:
We've just finished up our part
of the mission here. Let's take
a break and get some food.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0203
rows.name:
To commemorate Nis's first mission,
I've assigned him to cooking duty.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0204
rows.name:
Vandham did the same for
me on my first mission!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0205
rows.name: It's a tradition! Hahaha!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0206
rows.name:
Oh! That would be a great help.
Go ask Nis if there's anything
you can do to assist.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0207
rows.name:
Looks like we might get to
eat sooner than expected!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0301
rows.name: Nis's combat abilities are fine, but...

rows.label: qst102203_msg0302
rows.name:
He has a habit of worrying
too much about his comrades.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0303
rows.name:
I just hope it doesn't end
up working against him...

rows.label: qst102203_msg0401
rows.name:
Shade Trout and a Spoil-Apple,
huh... I see, I see.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0402
rows.name:
You can catch plenty of Shade
Trout upriver from here.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0403
rows.name:
As for Spoil-Apples...
Where was it now?

rows.label: qst102203_msg0404
rows.name:
All I remember is that
they're not easy to find...

rows.label: qst102203_msg0501
rows.name: Alright, time to eat!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0601
rows.name:
Man, Nis's cooking was
pretty damn good.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0602
rows.name:
Was that a Gulan style? The spices
had a real kick to them...

rows.label: qst102203_msg0603
rows.name:
Oh, sorry, sorry. You want to hear
about the next mission, right?

rows.label: qst102203_msg0604
rows.name:
I need you to fetch me
a Shining Stalactite.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0605
rows.name:
I've heard you can find them in
Spirit Crucible Elpys, but I've
had no luck finding one myself.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0606
rows.name: I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0607
rows.name:
While you're doing that,
we're going to head out to
subjugate the Brutal Aspid.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0608
rows.name:
I hear they're pretty
vicious creatures...

rows.label: qst102203_msg0609
rows.name:
It might be a bit much for Nis
on his first mission, but a little
challenge is good for you.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0610
rows.name:
Finding a Shining Stalactite
might be too easy for you, but
hey, consider it a little break.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0611
rows.name: Alright then, see you later.
